project.name: C-C806A-GIMP-03-ST03-DT06-DF12-CF03-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C806A-GIMP-03-ST03-DT06-DF12-CF03-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved jpg file Has a buffer declared on the stack. char[64] If input is shorter than 64 it will overflow,due to using improper sizeof and strlen checking

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.description: color invert an image Has a buffer declared on the stack. char[64] If input is shorter than 64 it will overflow,due to using improper sizeof and strlen checking

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="Hello World! If this statement isn't more than 64 characters, it will go badly" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
